title: Deflation increases real value of fixed incomes

content.question: Which of the following will most likely result from deflation?

choices.label: Increased real value of fixed incomes

content.answer: Increased real value of fixed incomes

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
